mapper.select: SELECT 'O1총괄' AS COL1 , 'OO지역' AS COL2 , #{schBizDv} AS COL3 , #{schDv} AS COL4 , #{schPdctTp} AS COL5 , #{schPdCdStrt} AS COL6 , #{schPdCdEnd} AS COL7 , #{schSlDtStrt} AS COL8 , #{schSlDtEnd} AS COL9 , #{schRcpDtStrt} AS COL10 , #{schRcpDtEnd} AS COL11 , '1234' AS COL12 , '1-일시불' AS COL13 , '1-정상가' AS COL14 , '3-3년' AS COL15 , '82' AS COL16 , 'A-전체' AS COL17 , '123,456' AS COL18 , '36' AS COL19 , '12,345' AS COL20 , '0' AS COL21 , '-' AS COL22 , '-' AS COL23 , '1-정상가' AS COL24 , '3-3년' AS COL25 , '82' AS COL26 , 'A-전체' AS COL27 , '123,456' AS COL28 , '36' AS COL29 , '12,345' AS COL30 , '0' AS COL31 , '-' AS COL32 , '-' AS COL33 , '1-정상가' AS COL34 , '3-3년' AS COL35 , '82' AS COL36 , 'A-전체' AS COL37 , '123,456' AS COL38 , '36' AS COL39 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'OO총괄' AS COL1 , 'OO지역' AS COL2 , '김웰스 지점' AS COL3 , '123456' AS COL4 , '김교원' AS COL5 , '렌탈' AS COL6 , '환경가전' AS COL7 , '-' AS COL8 , '2022-1234567-12' AS COL9 , '개인' AS COL10 , '2구 포터블 인덕션' AS COL11 , '1234' AS COL12 , '1-일시불' AS COL13 , '1-정상가' AS COL14 , '3-3년' AS COL15 , '82' AS COL16 , 'A-전체' AS COL17 , '123,456' AS COL18 , '36' AS COL19 , '12,345' AS COL20 , '0' AS COL21 , '-' AS COL22 , '-' AS COL23 , '1-정상가' AS COL24 , '3-3년' AS COL25 , '82' AS COL26 , 'A-전체' AS COL27 , '123,456' AS COL28 , '36' AS COL29 , '12,345' AS COL30 , '0' AS COL31 , '-' AS COL32 , '-' AS COL33 , '1-정상가' AS COL34 , '3-3년' AS COL35 , '82' AS COL36 , 'A-전체' AS COL37 , '123,456' AS COL38 , '36' AS COL39 FROM DUAL
